title: North Korea hails 'super large' launcher test as virus timing condemned
description: South Korea's army issued a stern statement saying that testing comes at a "very inappropriate" time.
content:

North Korea hailed a test of "super large" rocket launchers, just hours after the South condemned the state as "inappropriate" for pursing tests amid the gl… [+2837 chars]
